name: Space dizziness
description:
SPACE DIZZINESS!

Move yourself using this new experimental pulse motor. Don't know how to use it? Just point in the direction you want to move and Fire! By the way, do not run out of electric charge. You have to avoid the asteroids!

GENERAL INFORMATION

Space dizziness is a game made for the Kenney Jam 2021. The theme of the Jam is Rotation.

Game made using a homemade C engine. There are executables for Linux, Windows and an HTML version.

This game will be open-source soon, check our gitlab page. You can also check out our web page.

CREDITS CODE

  • Antonio Maciá (Tonet)
MUSIC AND GAME DESIGN
